encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

1.Ḥaẓiyyān ʾAṣḥaḥ, the paterfamilias of the house of the lineage of Nasrum, and his wife 2.Shammarum and their children ʾAsadum and Dalwān and Ḥabbāsh and Thawrum, of the 3.lineage of ʿAqīratum have built and repaired their house of Dhū-Dahr Ḍarrān and added to it 4.a roof. And they excavated and plastered and constructed a cistern and a conduit(?). And they constructed an irrigation scheme(?). And they 5.acquired their vineyard from the lineage of ʿArīm ʾAbīshirrān, and they planted their vineyard of Dhū- 6.Shabbāzān. And they acquired from the lineage of Kahnil a plot of land, the grazing capacity of which is 7.170 sheep. And they purchased male and female slaves. (All this) with the help of their 8.gods and by the command of their lords of the lineage of Sumhūsamaʿ.
